232.movie_plot: An overworked mother and her daughter do not get along. When they switch bodies, each is forced to adapt to the other's life for one freaky Friday.

280.movie_plot: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred in his Yellow Submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music hating Blue Meanies.

270.movie_plot: In New Jersey in 1935, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.

247.movie_plot: A woman suffering from amnesia begins to recover her memories after trouble from her past finds her again.

300.movie_plot: A lawyer makes an interesting discovery that could affect his chances of getting elected to office.

252.movie_plot: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the F.B.I., and the Mafia after jumping bail.

249.movie_plot: A bureaucrat, in a retro-future world, tries to correct an administrative error, and becomes an enemy of the state.

279.movie_plot: Peter Brackett and Sabrina Peterson are two competing Chicago newspaper reporters who join forces to unravel the mystery behind a train derailment.

278.movie_plot: Terry works for a bank, and uses computers to communicate with clients all over the world. One day she gets a coded message from an unknown source. After decoding the message, Terry becomes...

263.movie_plot: A Los Angeles Rams quarterback, accidentally taken away from his body by an overanxious angel before he was meant to die, returns to life in the body of a recently murdered millionaire.

264.movie_plot: A spoiled heiress running away from her family is helped by a man who is actually a reporter in need of a story.

245.movie_plot: A Witness Protection specialist becomes suspicious of his co-workers when dealing with a case involving high-tech weapons.

272.movie_plot: The adventures of the sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.

243.movie_plot: When two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

246.movie_plot: Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.

267.movie_plot: Years after her aunt was murdered in her home, a young woman moves back into the house with her new husband. However, he has a secret that he will do anything to protect, even if it means driving his wife insane.

294.movie_plot: Two con artists' plan to steal enough for a house are twisted when a pretty girl enters the picture.

165.movie_name: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan (1982)

118.movie_plot: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saves him from drowning as a boy and falls in love not knowing who/what she is.

41.movie_plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

79.movie_name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid (1969)

2.movie_plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

125.movie_plot: On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny, to prevent his trigger happy Captain from launching his missiles, before confirming his orders to do so.

199.movie_plot: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

198.movie_name: Man Who Would Be King, The (1975)

0.movie_plot: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

9.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

161.movie_plot: Two mysterious orphan children have extraordinary powers and are chased by a scheming millionaire. But where do these kids really call home?

174.movie_plot: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

14.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977)

99.movie_plot: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillian threatens to destroy a major superhero and the city.

13.movie_plot: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.

192.movie_plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

53.movie_plot: A gunslinger is embroiled in a war with a local drug runner.

207.movie_plot: A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.

187.movie_plot: Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

102.movie_plot: A high school teacher's personal life becomes complicated as he works with students during the school elections, particularly with an obsessive overachiever determined to become student body president.

175.movie_plot: A naive man is appointed to fill a vacancy in the United States Senate. His plans promptly collide with political corruption, but he doesn't back down.

67.movie_plot: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.

59.movie_plot: In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

65.movie_plot: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

111.movie_plot: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

91.movie_plot: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

163.movie_plot: When an alien spacecraft of enormous power is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral Kirk resumes command of the Starship Enterprise in order to intercept, examine and hopefully stop the intruder.

11.movie_plot: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

17.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

57.movie_plot: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

109.movie_plot: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

172.movie_plot: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical conman search for the missing component to a magic spell useful to the defense of Britain.

60.movie_plot: An ex-Navy Seal turned cook is the only person who can stop a group of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. battleship.

95.movie_plot: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

101.movie_plot: An unemployed defense worker frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society, begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

159.movie_plot: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

71.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade (1989)

188.movie_plot: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

166.movie_name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock (1984)
